file.name: schema.yml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  title: LORIS - Conflict Resolver Module
  description: Endpoints available for the Conflict Resolver module
  contact:
    name: LORIS Development Team
    url: 'https://github.com/aces/loris'
  license:
    name: 'GNU Public License, Version 3'
    url: 'https://opensource.org/licenses/GPL-3.0'
  version: 1.0.0
servers:
  - url: /
paths:
  /conflict_resolver:
    get:
      tags:
        - Conflict Resolver
      summary: Generates the html page for this module including the React component. 
      responses:
        '200':
          description: The html page with menu, breadcrumbs and the React component that interact with the backend for data requests and submission.
          content:
            text/html:
              schema:
                type: string

  /conflict_resolver/unresolved:
    get:
      tags:
        - Conflict Resolver
      summary: Get all unresolved conflicts
      responses:
        '200':
          description: An object containing the data and fieldOptions where data are the conflicts and fieldOptions are the options for the available filters.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/UnresolvedMenuFilterResponse'
    post:
      tags:
        - Conflict Resolver
      summary: Fix a given conflict by providing the correct answer.
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/FixConflictRequestBody'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Conflict fixed

  /conflict_resolver/resolved:
    get:
      tags:
        - Conflict Resolver
      summary: Get all resolved conflicts
      responses:
        '200':
          description: An object containing the data and fieldOptions where data are the conflicts and fieldOptions are the options for the available filters.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ResolvedMenuFilterResponse'          
components:
  schemas:
    FixConflictRequestBody:
      type: object
      properties:
        conflictid:
          type: integer
        correctanswer:
          type: string
          enum:
            - "1"
            - "2"
          description: The numeric string that corresponds to `Value 1` or `Value 2`.
    ResolvedMenuFilterResponse:
      type: object
      properties:
        data:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/ResolvedMenuData'
        fieldOptions:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/ResolvedFiltersOptions'
      example:
        data:
          - ResolvedID: '1126'
            Project: Pumpernickel
            Site: Montreal
            CandID: '300054'
            PSCID: MTL054
            Visit Label: V1
            Instrument: bmi
            Question: height_inches
            Value 1: '2'
            Value 2: '5'
            Correct Answer: '1'
            User 1: admin
            User 2: admin
            Resolver: admin
            ResolutionTimestamp: '2019-09-09 16:16:00'
        fieldOptions:
          site:
            Data Coordinating Center: Data Coordinating Center
            Montreal: Montreal
            Ottawa: Ottawa
            Rome: Rome
          instrument:
            aosi: AOSI
            bmi: BMI Calculator
            medical_history: Medical History
            mri_parameter_form: MRI Parameter Form
            radiology_review: Radiology review
            your_name: your (best) name
          visitLabel:
            V1: V1
            V2: V2
            V3: V3
            V4: V4
            V5: V5
            V6: V6
          project:
            Pumpernickel: Pumpernickel
            Rye: Rye
            Challah: Challah
            loris: loris
            
    ResolvedMenuData:
      type: array
      items:
        type: object
        properties:
          ResolvedID:
            type: string
          Project:
            type: string
          Site:
            type: string
          CandID:
            type: string
          PSCID:
            type: string
          Visit Label:
            type: string
          Instrument:
            type: string
          Question:
            type: string
          Value 1:
            type: string
          Value 2:
            type: string
          Correct Answer:
            type: string
          User 1:
            type: string
          User 2:
            type: string
          Resolver:
            type: string
          ResolutionTimestamp:
            type: string
            
    ResolvedFiltersOptions:
      type: object
      properties:
        site: 
          type: object
        instrument: 
          type: object
        visitLabel: 
          type: object
        project: 
          type: object
          
    UnresolvedMenuFilterResponse:
      type: object
      properties:
        data:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/UnresolvedMenuData'
        fieldOptions:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/UnresolvedFiltersOptions'
      example:
        data:
          ConflictID: '2087'
          Project: Pumpernickel
          Site: Montreal
          CandID: '300114'
          PSCID: MTL114
          Visit Label: V1
          Instrument: bmi
          Question: height_feet
          Value 1: '5'
          Value 2: '4'
        fieldOptions:
          site:
            Data Coordinating Center: Data Coordinating Center
            Montreal: Montreal
            Ottawa: Ottawa
            Rome: Rome
          instrument:
            aosi: AOSI
            bmi: BMI Calculator
            medical_history: Medical History
            mri_parameter_form: MRI Parameter Form
            radiology_review: Radiology review
          visitLabel:
            V1: V1
            V2: V2
            V3: V3
            V4: V4
            V5: V5
            V6: V6
          project:
            Pumpernickel: Pumpernickel
            Rye: Rye
            Challah: Challah
            loris: loris
        
    UnresolvedMenuData:
      type: array
      items:
        type: object
        properties:
          ConflictID:
            type: string
          Project:
            type: string
          Site:
            type: string
          CandID:
            type: string
          PSCID:
            type: string
          Visit Label:
            type: string
          Instrument:
            type: string
  
    UnresolvedFiltersOptions:
      type: object
      properties:
        site:
          type: object
        instrument:
          type: object
        visitLabel: 
          type: object
        project: 
          type: object
          
    
  securitySchemes:
    ApiKeyAuth:
      type: apiKey
      name: Authorization
      in: header
security:
  - ApiKeyAuth: []

Error: notImplemented: path "/conflict_resolver": get: responses: 200: contents: unsupported content types: [text/html]
